revision.revremark: Created from Econami Electric version 1.5 - Tsunami2 Electric Technical Reference version 1.0
Add ID CV 253,254,255,256 and change product ID to values in CV256
Change product ID to values in CVs 253(high byte) and 256(low byte)
Separate ECO CVs file for Extended Function Map. Add labels to Extended Function map CVs.
Volume and Alt volume display alignment.

family.name: Tsunami2 Electric
family.comment: These are the -retail- version Tsunami2 Electric decoders

variable.tooltip:
Sets the proportionality between locomotive speed and the RPM level of the traction motor sound effect.
A value of zero disables the sound effect.
While running the locomotive at a given speed, increasing the value will decrease the RPM level and vice versa.
variable.label: Traction Motor Rate

variable.tooltip: Decoder will ignore throttle commands and the locomotive will remain stopped until the pantograph function is turned on
variable.label: Pantograph Interlock

variable.tooltip: If enabled, the pantograph will raise when the decoder receives track power
variable.label: Auto Start Enable

variable.tooltip: Selects which airhorn to use
variable.label: Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Choose an alternate airhorn or a short blast of the primary airhorn
variable.label: Auxiliary Airhorn Select

variable.tooltip: Bell sound effect and ring-rate

enumChoice.choice: Rio Grande Southern Galloping Goose: slow
Rio Grande Southern Galloping Goose: medium-slow
Rio Grande Southern Galloping Goose: medium-fast
Rio Grande Southern Galloping Goose: fast

variable.label: Bell Select

variable.tooltip: Only AC traction motor sound effect with this decoder model
variable.label: Traction Motor Select

variable.tooltip: Select one of two air compressor sound effects
variable.label: Air Compressor Select

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the airhorn
variable.label: Airhorn Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the contactor camshaft
variable.label: Contactor Camshaft Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air compressor

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the traction motor

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the trolley bell
variable.label: Trolley Bell Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the stop request bell

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the air reservoir poppet valve releasing

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the Steam Generator

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the Cab Doors
variable.label: Cab Doors Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the volume of the trolley doors
variable.label: Trolley Doors Volume

variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the horn signal level to mix into the reverb input
variable.label: Horn Reverb Level

variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the contactor camshaft signal level to mix into the reverb input
variable.label: Contactor Camshaft Reverb Level

variable.tooltip: Sets the percentage of the air compressor signal level to mix into the reverb input
variable.label: Air Compressor Reverb Level

variable.tooltip: Adjust the duration that occurs between each subsequent pop! of the automatic poppet valve sound effect
variable.label: Poppet Valve Release Rate

variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum attenuation level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under light load. (higher no. = greater attenuation)
variable.label: Motor Low Volume Limit

variable.tooltip:
Sets the maximum volume level of the exhaust sound when the
locomotive is under heavy load. (higher no. = greater volume)
variable.label: Motor High Volume Limit

variable.tooltip: <html>to adjust the correlation between the throttle setting and motor load sensinglt;br> sets how much the load signal is affected by the model accelerating/decelerating</html>
variable.label: Load Sensitivity

factReset.label: Reset all CVs to factory defaults
